Text:
Thanks again, Ms. F.

Tell me, when do you get to upload the eps in your time? Is it consistant or whenever you get to it? I'd like to be able to schedule my downloads around it, is all, if possible.

Thanks

Most of the time I upload them right after I´m home from work...but since I´m working shifts it always changes..latest hour I´m home would be around 9 pm...! When I have some days off, I do it earlier, but since I need to be at home for at least 3 hours because I don´t let my computer run when I´m not home, so I don´t really have a schedule..!

Thanks for that, Ms. F. No problems.

I work shiftwork too (power industry). What shiftwork do you do, if I may be so bold as to ask?
I´m in retail...between 6.30 am and 9 pm..!
